required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: QL1706 Monotherapy or in Combination With Bevacizumab and XELOX as First-line Treatment of Unresectable Advanced or Metastatic CRC
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Multicenter Phase II Study of QL1706 Monotherapy or in Combination With Bevacizumab and XELOX as First-line Treatment of Unresectable Advanced or Metastatic CRC

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, muticenter phase II study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of QL1706 monotherapy or in combination with bevacizumab and XELOX as first-line treatment of unresectable advanced or metastatic CRC.

primary_outcome.description: ORR was assessed by investigators per Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors Version 1.1 (RECIST 1.1).

secondary_outcome.description: DCR was assessed by investigators per Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors Version 1.1 (RECIST 1.1).
DOR was assessed by investigators per Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors Version 1.1 (RECIST 1.1).
PFS was assessed by investigators per Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors Version 1.1 (RECIST 1.1).
OS was defined as the time from randomization to death due to any cause.

arm_group.arm_group_label: QL1706 in combination with bevacizumab and XELOX

intervention.description: 5 mg/kg administered as IV infusion on Day 1 of each 21-day cycle
intervention.arm_group_label: QL1706 in combination with bevacizumab and XELOX

intervention.description: 7.5 mg/kg administered as IV infusion on Day 1 of each 21-day cycle
intervention.arm_group_label: QL1706 in combination with bevacizumab and XELOX

intervention.description: 130mg/m2 administered as IV infusion on Day 1 of each 21-day cycle
intervention.arm_group_label: QL1706 in combination with bevacizumab and XELOX

intervention.description: 1000 mg/m2 orally twice daily for 14 days continuous dosing followed by a 7-day break of each 21-day cycle
intervention.arm_group_label: QL1706 in combination with bevacizumab and XELOX

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 1. Subjects participate voluntarily and sign informed consent.
- 2. Age ≥ 18 and ≤ 80 years old, male or female.
- 3. Histologically confirmed unresectable locally advanced or metastatic adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum.
- 4. At least 1 measurable target lesion according to Response Evaluation in Solid Tumors (RECIST 1.1).
Exclusion Criteria:
- 1. Diagnosed additional maliganancy within 5 years with the expection of curatively treated basal cell carcinoma of the skin, squamous cell carcinoma of the skin,curatively resected in situ cervival or non-muscle invasive bladder cancers.
- 2. Presence of brain metastases (asymptomatic brain metastases or symptomatic brain metastases who are stable at least 4 weeks, were allowed to be enrolled).
- 3. Has active autoimmune disease that has required systemic treatment in past 2 years.
- 4. Significant cardiovascular disease.
